text: aur anaath ke dhan ko haath na lagao, kintu aise tareeqe se jo uttam ho, yahaan tak ki vah apanee yuvaavastha ko pahunch jae. aur inasaaf ke saath poora-poora naapo aur taulo. ham kisee vyakti par usee kaam kee zimmedaaree ka bojh daalate hain jo usakee saamarthy mein ho. aur jab baat kaho, to nyaay kee kaho, chaahe maamala apane naatedaar hee ka kyon na ho, aur allaah kee pratigya ko poora karo. ye baaten hain, jinakee usane tumhen taakeed kee hai. aasha hai tum dhyaan rakhoge
